LanguageData.allowUseBuildingUsageDesc: Allow using building. (Cutting power wont help pawns to not use the building)
LanguageData.shouldSwitchPowerDesc: Allow pawns to cut power while the table is not used
LanguageData.shouldSpawnUnpoweredTooltip: Buildings will not have power when constructed.
LanguageData.shouldLoadPowerStateAfterLoadLabel: Should load buildings power state when loading a save game.
LanguageData.shouldLoadPowerStateAfterLoadTooltip: When enabled, buildings keep power state when loading a save game. (This is useful when the mod is added existing a save file for the first time )
LanguageData.hideTogglePowerTooltip: When enabled, designate power button will not be shown. \n(Use "Allow Use Building" to pawns do NOT use the building) \n(Only works on the building that require power to work!)
LanguageData.hideForbidBuildingTooltip: When enabled, allow use building button will be hidden.
